text: The Best Man Wins is a 1910 American silent drama movie.THE BEST MAN WINS It stars Anna Rosemond, Martin Faust, and Frank H. Crane. ==Actors== *Anna Rosemond as Julia Seaton, the rich heiress *Martin Faust as Dr. John Seymour, the wealthy physician *Frank H. Crane as Richard Calhoun, the poor lawyer *Marie Eline as May, the young daughter ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1910 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies
title: The Best Man Wins (1910 movie)
